contextvoting 0.0.0.1
  • Reference

Set Characteristics of Two Parties

setparty.Rd

Set ideologies and capacity of parties (i.e., blue and red) running in election.

setparty(blue_startloc = -0.8, red_startloc = 0.8,
  startloc_noise = 0.1, blue_startcapacity = 0,
  red_startcapacity = 0, startcapacity_noise = 0.1,
  startincumbent = NULL, blue_loc_seed = NULL, red_loc_seed = NULL,
  blue_capacity_seed = NULL, red_capacity_seed = NULL)

Arguments

blue_startloc

Starting location of blue party ideology.
red_startloc

Starting location of red party ideology.
startloc_noise

Random noise given to the starting locations of party ideologies.
blue_startcapacity

Starting level of blue party capacity.
red_startcapacity

Starting level of red party capacity.
startcapacity_noise

Random noise given to the starting level of party capacities.
startincumbent

Incumbent in the first election. If NULL, randomly chosen.
blue_loc_seed

Random number seed to draw blue party ideology.
red_loc_seed

Random number seed to draw red party ideology.
blue_capacity_seed

Random number seed to draw blue party capacity.
red_capacity_seed

Random number seed to draw red party capacity.

Value

The updated list of ideology parameters

  • loc ideology locations of two parties.

  • capacity capacity levels of two parties.

  • tracker Tracker of the history of ideogoloy and capacity.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
